messages.subject: Re: pools, yes!
messages.msgSnippet: **** The beach, the swimming hole - who needs a pool? Me? I hate to put my feet where I can t see the bottom. I m not a big fan of swimming in lakes and
messages.messageBody:
****> The beach, the swimming hole - who needs a pool?

Me?

I hate to put my feet where I can't see the bottom. I'm not a big fan of

swimming in lakes and oceans. I will, but it's not as pleasant. I get a
little
antsy. Give me the pool anytime! <g>

~Kelly (the worm lover, but NOT if they're under murky water!)****

Actually Kelly, I think I said that because this is the first summer in
quite a while when we don't have access to a pool and I'm a little down
about that. I'm trying to convince myself that we will have swimming
fun despite no pool. I actually don't care much for the swimming hole -
one of my best friends would get in there with the kids and swim, I
stayed on the shore. But she has moved and now it's up to me to get in
there and swim. Wish me luck, maybe the yuck factor will be low this
year..

Kate
who loves to swim
